text: 'uwlayik al'anbia' aladhin 'aneamna ealayhim bialhidayat walnubuat hum aladhin ataynahum alkitab kasahf 'iibrahim watawrat musaa wazubur dawud wa'iinjil eisaa, wataynahum fahm hadhih alkutubu, wakhtarnahum li'iiblagh wahinana, fa'iina yajhad -aiyha alrasula- biayat hdha alquran alkfar min qawmika, faqad wakalna biha qwmana akharin -ay: almuhajirin wal'ansar wa'atbaeuhum 'iilaa yawm alqiamati- laysuu biha bikafirina, bal muwminun biha, eamilun bima tadulu eilayha
